name: Bungalows 313

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We just returned from Sonoma. We stayed in Bungalow 313 for three nights. We used the Luna unit -- purty nice (sic).
reviews.title: Quirky Elegance

reviews.text: We had a wonderful experience at this delightful B&B. Denise and Tony were excellent hosts. The bungalow was clean, with attention to detail, and the grounds were lovely. We felt as though we were back in Tuscany. Very enjoyable stay. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Loved Bungalows 313
quality quality quality - location location location
reviews.text: During my recent visit to California, I had an experience worth sharing with other fellow travelers with discriminating taste.

reviews.title: Perfect stay, what more could you want?
reviews.text: My past experiences could not compare to this visit. Of course I enjoyed the wineries as usual and even found a new shopping spot. But most importantly, I discovered my favorite new place to stay, Bungalow 313.

reviews.title: Cute bungalow, great scones, good people!
reviews.text: It was if I had ventured into Italy and was staying in a friends guest house! The luxuries of an upscale hotel suite with the privacy and comorts of being at home. Even the granola was over the top. They should sell it so you can take it home with you.

We found this place on TripAdvisor website and LOVED every moment of our stay. The location is amazing - just a block away from the plaza in Sonoma. We could walk to and from dinner every night. There is also a wonderful walking trail we ran on every day which was perfect. There are many wineries within walking distance to enjoy.
reviews.title: Loved It!

reviews.text: The accomodations are so luxurious, personalized, comfortable, and clean. I could have moved into the Bella Suite, it was that nice!!! The breakfast each day was hanging from your door and was AMAZING! They thought of every detail in the room.
reviews.title: Honeymoon "sweet"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The courtyard was so calm and relaxing and a wonderful place to relax or meet other guests. We enjoyed wine and cheese with some fellow guests there one evening before dinner and were joined by the owners, which was a treat!! The owners are a very warm and gracious family.
reviews.title: Romantic B&B

likes.liked: — The very personalized service, the quiet location and the close proximity to downtown Sonoma

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Every recommendation the owners gave us for restaurants, shops and wine tours was right on. We had a wonderful wine tour guide they recommended - Eric from Vintage Chrome Tours and Adventures, who was very knowledgable and accomodating.
reviews.title: Superb laid back elegance

description: Bungalows313 is an intimate luxury inn uniquely located 1/2 block from the Historic Sonoma Plaza. This European styled boutique features private bungalows nestled in a soothing courtyard. A haven of sensory delight awaits the discriminate connoisseur. The emphasis is one of informality, comfort, privacy all harmonizing with the natural beauty of Sonoma Wine Country.
